name: Piggy's Kitchen
description:
Cooking sim developed with a focus on resource management.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to interact 

Crate- Receive Objects

Counter- Place/Pickup objects. Combine bread and cheese (will create an bread+cheese item)

Stove- Cook tomato soup (tomato) or grilled cheese (bread+cheese(together) and butter)

Objective: Keep the restaurant running as long as possible. Make sure your gold balance doesn't reach negatives or you go bankrupt (aka game over).

Developed by: Jessica Bek, Apoorva Kaushik, William Yang

Presentation
